summary: Simple replacement of the werewolf skin and eyes to look more like a real wolf. Now Automatic Variants friendly!
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]PCrciWDW92Y[/youtube]
Video created by BDMods! Thanks, guys :)

EDIT X3: Changed the filename since some people have been giving me flak on \"more realistic\"... you know what I meant, guys ;P

EDIT X2: Added 3 more colors for a total of six, and three new eye colors. Also added an Automatic Variants package!

EDIT: Added 2 more colors per request :)  Blonde and Brown now up for download as well! Thanks for the feedback, you guys!

Just what it says on the tin! I wasn\'t satisfied with the other options out there, so I painted my own. Fairly high-res texture, modeled to look more like your average grey wolf. First Skyrim texture edit, worked from Bellyache\'s hairier werewolves texture found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621
author: Foxcraft7
